meanings.definition: The quality of being able to be adjusted.
meanings.sent1: Her adjustabilities allowed her to change the settings easily.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic was impressed by the car's various adjustabilities.
meanings.sent3: The robot's adjustabilities made it the most flexible machine in the factory.
meanings.sent4: His adjustabilities were like a Swiss army knife, always ready for any situation.
meanings.sent5: The adjustabilities of the chair made it perfect for people of all sizes.

meanings.definition: The range of adjustments that can be made.
meanings.sent1: The adjustabilities of the telescope allowed for precise focus.
meanings.sent2: The adjustabilities of the computer monitor were limited.
meanings.sent3: The adjustabilities of the TV remote seemed endless, like a magic wand.
meanings.sent4: Her adjustabilities in problem-solving were unmatched in the team.
meanings.sent5: The adjustabilities of the camera lens made it versatile for different shots.
